statements: SELECT * FROM Messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT message_text FROM Messages WHERE receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM Messages WHERE timestamp > '2023-01-01 00:00:00'
